desc: Freelancer in Web Development, I Develop Professional Websites with Extreme Passion and Professionalism
Com a utilização de ferramentas como o A: Using tools such as Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator Figma or Adobe XD, I create perfect designs for your business. Allowing the visualization of the Website, before it is fully developed and hosted.
Crio e desenvolvo Web Sites utilizando t: I create and develop Web Sites using technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Thus being able to create Dynamic Web Sites, Portfolios, E-commerce and Blogs
Nos dias que correm, visualizamos Websit: These days, we view websites on various devices such as mobile phones, computers and tablets. Which in turn has screens of different sizes. Through responsive design I ensure that websites are displayed flawlessly on all these devices.
Olá o meu nome é Carlos Barros, sou free: Hi my name is Carlos Barros, I am a freelancer in web development, I live in the north of Portugal, I am 31 years old. My professional objective is the creation of E-commerce, allowing the opening of new digital stores or renovations of existing ones, creating portfolios and blogs. Contributing to increased business flow, as well as increasing its visibility. The awakening of this profession started very early, at the age of 15 I had access to the internet for the first time. This awakened in me a huge desire to know how it worked. I was interested in developing websites right away. Platforms like Worpress and Microsoft Front Page allowed me to start creating copies of existing sites and developing my own, but without ever exposing them professionally. I studied electronics, which allowed me to have access to programming languages, algorithms, digital systems and, as such, problem solving. Nowadays I use technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript, which are the most used on the internet to create web sites. Giving me the possibility to develop them, with the greatest professionalism and quality! You can see below the courses I took for all my professional learning. I love this branch because it's a continuous space for growth and learning. I consider myself a person who loves to learn and solve problems, I also like to read technical and self-development books, which I feel is essential for my personal and professional development. (You can access my reading list here.) For all this and much more, I hope you will contact me so that it is possible for me to help you achieve what you want so much.
